'''Pyroculus Resonance Stone''' is a consumable [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[Pyroculus|Pyroculi]]. It can be created through [[alchemy]] after using the [[Instructions: Pyroculus Resonance Stone|instructions]] obtained by reaching [[Tribe Reputation]] Level 4 with 4 tribes in [[Natlan]].
